item.title: BRAC Bank introduces scholarship support for employees' children with disabilities
item.description: BRAC Bank has introduced a scholarship programme to support the education of employees' children with disabilities, reinforcing its commitment to inclusion, dignity, and equal opportunity. Under the scholarship programme, BRAC Bank will provide monthly financial assistance for each eligible child.
